titleStmt.title: A collection of 86 loyal poems all of them written upon the two late plots viz, the horrid Salamanca plot in 1687, and the present fanatical conspiracy in 1683 : to which is added, advice to the carver : written on the death of the late L. Stafford : with several poems on their majesties coronation, never before published / collected by N.T.
titleStmt.author: Thompson, Nathaniel, d. 1687.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
